name: Ch9BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Neimi;Um... Vanessa?|How are you adjusting to serving under Prince Ephraim?
speak;Vanessa;I'm still getting used to it.|Prince Ephraim's command style is quite different from Princess Eirika's.
speak;Neimi;Y-yes, I've noticed that too.|Princess Eirika was always so...|so gentle with her commands.
speak;Vanessa;Indeed.|Princess Eirika leads with compassion and diplomacy.|Prince Ephraim is more... direct.
speak;Neimi;He's a bit intimidating...|I get nervous when he gives orders.|Do you think he's angry with us?
speak;Vanessa;Not at all, Neimi.|That's just his way.|He's a battlefield commander through and through.
speak;Neimi;I see...|Princess Eirika always explained her plans in detail.|Prince Ephraim just expects us to follow.
speak;Vanessa;They were raised differently, despite being twins.|Princess Eirika was groomed for diplomacy.|Prince Ephraim was trained for direct military command.
speak;Neimi;I noticed that Princess Eirika always asked if everyone was alright after battle...|Prince Ephraim checks our weapons first.
speak;Vanessa;That's a good observation.|Princess Eirika focuses on the people.|Prince Ephraim focuses on readiness.
speak;Colm;Hey, are you two comparing our royal commanders?|Mind if I join in?
speak;Vanessa;We're discussing the differences in their leadership styles.|Have you noticed them as well, Colm?
speak;Colm;Who hasn't?|Under Princess Eirika, I had to report every little thing I took—er, found.|Prince Ephraim just asks if I got anything useful!
speak;Neimi;Colm!|You shouldn't be taking things that don't belong to you!
speak;Colm;Hey, I'm scouting and gathering intelligence!|That's what I'm good at!|Prince Ephraim understands that.
speak;Vanessa;There are advantages to both approaches.|Princess Eirika's careful planning meant fewer surprises.|Prince Ephraim's boldness has gotten us out of tight spots.
speak;Vanessa;Sister!|Yes, we were comparing Princess Eirika's and Prince Ephraim's command styles.
speak;Syrene;Both are worthy leaders, though quite different.|As knights of Frelia, we serve them both with equal loyalty.
speak;Neimi;I-I think I'm starting to understand Prince Ephraim better.|He may seem harsh, but...|he really cares about everyone's safety.
speak;Syrene;Exactly, Neimi.|Princess Eirika shows her concern openly.|Prince Ephraim shows it through thorough preparation.
speak;Vanessa;Yesterday, Prince Ephraim personally checked every archer's bowstring before the march.|He knows our roles are crucial.
speak;Neimi;He did?|I thought he was just inspecting our equipment...|He actually told me my aim was impressive.
speak;Syrene;See?|Different methods, same goal—keeping everyone alive and winning this war.
speak;Vanessa;I think I prefer knowing exactly what's expected of me.|Prince Ephraim's direct orders make battlefield decisions clearer.
speak;Neimi;And Princess Eirika helped me feel braver when I was scared.|Maybe... maybe we need both of them.
speak;Syrene;Precisely.|That's why they're stronger together.|And why Renais has always had two heirs.
speak;Neimi;I think I'll try to be less nervous around Prince Ephraim now.|His directness isn't unkindness...|it's just his way of leading.
speak;Vanessa;That's the spirit, Neimi.|And remember, if you ever feel unsure of his orders...|you can always ask me.
speak;Neimi;Thank you, Vanessa.|I'm glad we had this talk.|I feel better about following Prince Ephraim now.
speak;Vanessa;That's what comrades are for.|Now, shall we prepare our equipment?|Prince Ephraim will be conducting inspections soon.
speak;Neimi;Yes!|I'll make sure my bow is ready!|And maybe I'll even speak up during the strategy meeting!
